title: Berrington Stripe Pyjama Bottoms
description: The Berrington Stripe Pyjama Bottoms will provide you with superior comfort for days when relaxation is your top priority. Crafted in cotton, they feature a PINK stamped waistband and our cheeky fox logo. The Berrington Pyjama Bottoms are the perfect accompaniment to our Chiswick Undershirt, completing the ultimate cosy ensemble.

title: Dickens Suit Trousers
description: The Dickens Suit is the foundation to your evening wear ensemble. A timeless evening  that is meticulously crafted from an English Alfred Brown black wool barathea. The straight  have been designed with military braids, half slant pockets, horn buttons and additional interior brace buttons. With adjustable sidebands, the Dickens Suit Trousers will offer comfortable sartorial style. Marry up the look with the Dickens Suit Jacket.  Complimentary alteration is available in selected stores, find out more .

title: Single Plain Cotton Handkerchief
description: No gentleman should ever be without a handkerchief. The single plain cotton handkerchief features a contemporary bold and discreet Pink logo on border.

title: Dickens Suit Jacket
description: The Dickens Suit is the foundation to your evening wear ensemble. A timeless evening  that is meticulously crafted from an English Alfred Brown black wool barathea and featuring Ottoman silk covered buttons and peak lapels. The single breasted  is designed with a traditional one-button closure, two pockets, and has no back vent, according to British evening wear dress rules. Inside, the jacket is lined with a black herringbone fabric and offers two pockets, an additional pen pocket and our Pink label. Marry up the look with the Dickens Suit Trousers. Complimentary alteration is available in selected stores, find out more .

title: Arlington Jacket
description: The Arlington Jacket provides a seasonal dash of colour with a rich tonal melange check pattern with red and blue accents. The jacket is fabricated in Lora Piana cloth and follows a classic construction with two button fastening, two side pockets, notch lapel and single back vent. The Arlington Jacket can be easily paired with a variety of different trouser and chino options for the perfect sophisticated look.

title: Burford Suit Jacket
description: The Burford Suit Jacket is a versatile everyday piece which features our most tailored fit, the Belgravia. The suit is constructed from the highest quality wool from Lora Piana and produced in Italy with a natural stretch. The jacket features horn buttons and follows a classic two-button construction with two side pockets, notch lapel and double back vent, with the interior featuring a further two pockets, pen pocket and signature Pink label.Our Burford Suit Jacket and Trousers are sold separately to ensure flexibility in fit and durability in wear. Marry the two together for a refined, interesting look which mixes everyday versatility with unique Pink styling.

description: The Travellers are s designed for the man on the go. With a unique easy care finish that minimises the need for ironing and a permanent crease on the sleeves, you will step off the plane looking as sharp as when you took off.
